page.description: When building multiple UX components, it can become tiresome to have to re-create identical controls multiple times. One way to avoid this is to create a control and then save that individual control in the controls library. You can save controls using the Additional Options menu on the UX Controls page.

step.description: First Create a Control on the UX Controls page.
Click the Menu button on the toolbar and select 'Save selected controls in library'.
Give the control a name and, optionally, a description. Also specify where the controls should be saved and click OK.
The control should now be saved and available for use in other components. In order to load the control use the '[Load controls from library]'.
